h2_title: Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: The bad news is once the Stone Vanguard is gone, the Shigandang will turn on you, and he is an extremely tough boss to fight this early, so only do this if you really don't want to fight the Stone Vanguard yourself! You can also resummon the Shigandang later for a fairer matchup once you've gotten stronger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stone_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Stone Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang'.
The content is as follows:
The bad news is once the Stone Vanguard is gone, the Shigandang will turn on you, and he is an extremely tough boss to fight this early, so only do this if you really don't want to fight the Stone Vanguard yourself! You can also resummon the Shigandang later for a fairer matchup once you've gotten stronger.
